files.patch:
@@ -1255,1 +1255,2 @@
-  <Event name="DeprecatedInvocation" description= "A unique invocation of a method that is annotated with @Deprecated. Packages and modules that are deprecated are ignored." category="Java Application, Statistics" label="Deprecated Method Invocation" thread="false" stackTrace="true" startTime="false" level="forRemoval,all">
+  <Event name="DeprecatedInvocation" description= "A unique invocation of a method that is annotated with @Deprecated. At most 10 000 invocation sites and only the first invocation from a class is guaranteed to be included."
+   category="Java Application, Statistics" label="Deprecated Method Invocation" thread="false" stackTrace="true" startTime="false" level="forRemoval,all">
